On this one, you need to hold the TV up while someone screws the mounting plate onto the TV.

This was well priced, sturdy, easy to install.  You have to mount it on a stud in the wall. The mount joints are stiff.  Even though there is a generous pack of screws of various lengths and washers, I still had to improvise to mount the television. Good value

Very functional and worth the price but not very sturdy. I have had to go back and retighten a few times. If you have no intention of using the articulating arms, it will be fine, but if you use it a lot you will have to check the screws on a regular basis.
It was easy to install and it is very sturdy and easy to turn.  Like this was best of all.  WE have a different brand one in the master bedroom.  What a steal!
Holds my 46" with no problem and swings out to whatever position I need.  Excellent product for the price.  A good buy.
We have this in our living room and it displays our flat screen beautifully, I can't believe we waited to long to get one!
summary: I highly recommend this product for it's values and quality.

reviewText: Good wall mount. Sturdy and does what it is supposed to do. In fact, it even held a larger TV than what it was listed as capable of holding. I believe I mounted a 42" television with this one. Not a flat-flat one either. I mounted an older heavy thick one.
This Wall Mount works perfect for Samsung 45 inch TV which we have wall mounted through our 20 year old entertainment center in the front.  It has rigt long arm and does everything what is described.

I am not sure why but for some reason the arms have bent a little so when I rotate the tv it tends to be crooked. Everything was mounted properly and my tv is not too large, I only have a 32" LED that weighs 14 lbs.

This was half the price of the TV mounts at Costco and perfectly fits a Vizio 37" TV for the spare bedroom. It will work with many different brands so in my book that is great. Strong, sturdy and robust.

I used this product to mount my 32 inch Olevia. It is working good so far.  I don't really plan to do too much movement, but I wanted to have the option.  This mount does the trick.  It seems to be a good value.  It is not flimsy, but just based on its small size, if you TV weighs more than 35 lbs don't plan on doing too much movement. The instructions don't give you the hint, but I suggest unbolting the plate from the arm, securing it to the TV, mounting the rest of the arm to the wall, and the rebolting the TV/plate onto the arm.

This is possibly one of the best mounting kits I've ever purchased. I like the fact that there are pieces so the mounting kit can cater to all models of TV. (Whether they have a rounded or flat back). Mine had a flat back so I didn't need the extra piece, but once that step was cleared it was only a matter of minutes before it went up on my wall.  The adjustable arm is nice, as it is setup in our bedroom. At night the TV is angled towards the bed and makes it super easy for both of us to see up on the wall, and during the day its turned in another direction towards my desk - also making the ability to view the TV while working.The material is very strong, hubby did a pull up on the bar and it didn't even budge.  This thing seems as though it will last quite a long time.  It's already been up for over a month and it was a wonderful addition to my master bedroom, I'll be purchasing more over time for the other rooms in the home with larger model TVs.

We installed this in a flash! Maybe 20 minutes... after we located our wall stud. The screws are VERY good (hex screws), and the directions on how to put it onto my difficult flat panel were great. I attached this to my MAG 32" flat panel that I purchase from STAPLES store back in 2004. I couldn't find any mount to fit this TV, until NOW! I love it. I know it will hold up well. The swivel/tilt/movable arm feature is AMAZING!!! It truly does move and adapt to any angle you need. Don't hesitate to buy it! Just do it! - It's VESA compatible. If you are curious if it will fit your TV, go online and look at your model of TV and check if it says "VESA compatible". VESA refers to the 4 arms you see sticking out of each corner in the picture, and they move around to wherever the holes are on the back of your TV. Any questions? Just ask me!
Installation was a breeze. Will work with any Vesa mount TV. Tilts and rotates with ease. Can't beat the value!
Exactly as described.Very heavy duty.Lots of parts to make any installation work.Excellent value.Fits various monitors and tvs.

I bought three of these mounts for all the bedrooms in my house. I love all three of them. All mounts have different tv's on them, One is a 50", 40" and a 32". Product comes with multiple screw for different tvs. Outstanding product for the price. All tv's have been mount for a little over a year. This product is a full motion mount for $29.99!! and it is Prime!

This mount was a bargain and quality at the same time!  Easy to install and easy to hang the tv. The only thing I would recommend is to buy separate drywall mounts. I didn't feel comfortable using the ones that came with it, instead I bought 75lb mounts from my local hardware store and used them. Other than that, I love the mount!

For the money it works fine, but it will take two people to mount your TV to the bracket.  The bracket and mount are sturdy enough but it will not articulate as smoothly as some of the higher priced models.  Also, do not bother with the bubble level as it is cheaply made and will not provide an accurate reading.I will keep this one as I already mounted up the TV, but the next unit I buy will be a higher priced, easier to articulate mount.
summary: Okay for the money, but you get what you pay for

reviewText: This TV stand is being used for our 32" Vizio. The hardware included was perfect and the stand bolted right up. I did need a socket and ratchet. Getting the TV into place however, was a bit more difficult. I recommend having a second person to install. One to hold the TV in place while another lines up and inserts the screws into the back of the TV. This wall mount is pretty strong, and seems to hold my TV's weight without any strain.
It works great for our TV and was so reasonably priced compared to all the others we had looked at in stores.

Has been holding daughter tv up for couple years now it is good and strong 32 inch if your looking for something flat on wall this isn't what you want this sits a little off wall and can pull in and out must pull from both sides of TV may be difficult at times and you may have to secure bolts over time because pulling back and forth loosens up but they give you a tool keep it in safe place just for those times over all good product glad I got it.
This tv mount is perfect for our granddaughters room. The price was amazing.  Much cheaper than any store around and great quality.

I was looking for an articulating wall mount arm for a 32" LCD that would mount near the corner of a wall.  Because of the TV's location I wanted something that would provide flexability and movement for optimal viewing angles.  I looked at several brands but for the price I was leaning toward the VideoSecu mount. The product description says it will hold a screen up to 37" so this should be no problem.I would not recommend this for someone who needs to move a large screen very often because the mount becomes stiff at the various joints under the weight of the TV. If you are looking for something you can set in one place (or periodically move) that offers more flexability than a traditional wall mount, this is an awesome product for the price.If I had it to do over again, I'd buy the same mount...
summary: VideoSecu Articulating Wall Mount for 37" TV

reviewText: I was surprised with how heavy this box was when it came in. My husband installed the mount and tv without any help while I was at work. The tv has been up on the wall for a couple weeks and we have had no issues. We use the swing arm to tilt the tv towards the exercise equipment while we are working out and push it back against the wall in the evenings when we are watching movies.

I bought this, got it 2 days later, and installed it in about 15 min. It took me about 10 to find a bit to drill into the stud. I didnt even bother waiting for my husband to get home to help since I didnt need it. It came with a lot of extra screws to fit your tv just right. It works with both flat and curved television backs which I thought was handy and all the hardware to make it work for either.

I usually never write reviews but after recieving this item and getting it put up I felt i needed too due to some of the negative reviews I read while doing some research on this item.I have a 46" Samsung LCD, not the skinny one it weighs 46 lbs. By no means is the mount sagging at any point. Full extension or swiveled it does not sag one bit and I am very confident that it will hold because I did a pull up on the arm before installing the tv just to be sure. Make sure and tighten down the allenhead bolts for the tilt once you get it to the tilted angle that you are looking for. They give you more than enough hardware for whatever the case may be so do not worry if they will have the right size bolts because there are multiples .Overall a great product for the money and if you are thinking of this at all, dont think anymore, BUY!!
summary: Great value for the price!!! 46" LCD

reviewText: Cheapest price we could find for wall mount designed for our new tv.  We can turn the tv toward the sofa or toward the kitchen, press it against the wall, or pull it out.  One thing to keep in mind is that the tv is only flush witht he wall when the arm is off to the side, so centering the base on the wall won't center the tv.

I am using this mount for a 27" LCD in my bedroom. Using a swivel mount with tilt works great for almost any room layout. The black powder-coat paint matches the TV, and looks great. Adjustment and locking is easy with the included hex wrench. I would rate this "5 stars" if the mounting screws were better. Made from relatively soft steel, the screw head strips very easily. After ruining one screw, I replaced it with a large black deck screw. It might be advisable to drill small pilot holes before attempting to drive the screws.Word of caution: If you do not drive the proper mounting screws into the center of a wall stud, if you exceed the specified TV weight limit, or if you try to get by with a really cheap swing arm mount, you may be signing a death sentence for your $500 TV (and perhaps yourself)!
No complaints here. If you need an articulating mount for a mid-sized TV, you can't go wrong with this one.Very solid. Holds in place firmly.
For the price this was a grade product, nothing to compare to it at walmart or locally.  PLUS you got an HDMI cable.
Awesome price and quality. Simple and easy to install and fully equipped for installation. If you need a swing arm mount for medium size tv this is one I'd recommend.
Great price and it works perfectly. We have others in the house that cost much more and they are no better than this one.

The instructions and fastener labeling was a bit vague, but I was able to install it with ease. Works great! After buying a competitive product at Best Buy for $125...I found this gem on Amazon.com, for a fraction of the price. I returned the Best Buy product the next day. Thank you, Amazon!
summary: Works great at a fraction of the cost of others

reviewText: I mounted this in my RV and it holds a 26" LCD TV / DVD combo.  Installation was very easy and the mount works GREAT!  I was prepared to pay 5 times the price for a mount that would work as I wanted.  I couldn't be happier.

Got my TV mounted with this above my PC and its been on the wall for a year now. No problems with it holds the TV well and its study. Way cheaper than store bought and its perfect for what I got i got a 37 inch HDTV

This flat panel mount is adjustable and very cost effective. This arm comes with all needed mounting hardware. It also comes with a small wrench and an allen wrench for adjustments. One draw back, the mounting bracket base is a little larger than a stud. I aligned two of the holes in the center of the stud and used two heavy duty zip wall anchors for the other two holes. The flat panel I mounted was a Sony 32" and 29 lbs.
I really like the action on this mount.  I purchased a 27" monitor for my wife and this mount really frees up the desktop real estate.  I would purchase again.

This wall mount came with very easy to follow instructions. I used this to mount my LG LCD TV and it took less than 15 minutes. A lot of the reviewers say that it is difficult to move the articulating arm. It is difficult, but I would rather it be tight fitting so it does not bounce and swing around. If you are using the tilt feature, there is a nut that needs to be tightened once you have the degree of tilt you desire. We did not tighten out bolt because we wanted our tilted; however, if you do not want it fully tilted, you will need to tighten the bolt. I will be purchasing more mounts for my bedroom, my kids bedrooms and my kitchen. I should have purchased this years ago when I first bought my flat screen!
summary: Very Easy To Install Wall Mount

reviewText: great price, easy to install, works perfect.  would recommend this product to everyone. nice to have no more TV stands on the floor.

We had bought a more expensive one......and returned it because it was so complicated.  This TV wall mount was easy to install.  We have it supporting our 40" Samsung....we are so pleased with it.....highly recommend it!!

Bought this for the great price and free shipping. Cannot touch one of these in Hawaii of any quality for less than a hundred bucks. Good quality, installed easily but when we went to put the TV on...well we are now waiting for the adapter/extension to fit our TV. Make sure to verify that the holes on your TV/Monitor will match up with the mounting plate....if not make sure to order the adapter for this. Still a good deal and was very relieved to find out there was an adapter available!VideoSecu Universal VESA Adapter Plate LED LCD Plasma TV Wall Mount Bracket Extender MLEB 1UUBottom line: I would purchase this mount again and would recommend as a good buy.

This is an excellent product at an excellent price.  I would definitely repurchase & recommend this product to anyone looking for a tv mount.  Similar products in box stores cost at least double the price of this mount.
Worked perfectly to mount my tv to the wall. TV now swivels easily to accomodate me. It was very easy to install and very sturdy, I was worried it would be cheap but I was incorrect!

I like this mount because of the tilt function and more importantly, because of the extension.  I also like the multiple ways to attach the mount depending on the tv size.  It arrived on expected time and was fairly easy to install. If I ever need another mount,  I will buy another just like it,
Well worth the money would buy again and suggest item built as good as the ones in the stores for double the money

This TV wall mount serves its purpose and that's it. It's not easy to adjust. It is really cheap feeling and seems to make the TV lean one way or another. It was better than paying $65-$70 at best buy. I like it enough to not return it though and I'm super meticulous.

After looking around a bit I took the chance for some of the "cheaper" wall mounts in the market. This was a great decision. This mount is easy, sturdy as keeps my 32" LCD were I wanted, moves nicely (after having to play around a little as the beginning the arms were a bit tight). It is a very good buy, and bought a second one for a smaller TV
summary: Easy to install and very good price!

reviewText: This is the second articulating TV mount I have ever purchased. The first cost a hundred bucks and I had to put it together myself. It took a couple of hours.This one was twenty five bucks and took ten minutes start to finish.If everything I bought was as good as this I would start to think life is fair. jk
i mounted a 42 inch on my wall, and it really does the job. for the price you pay, this is an absolute steal. highly recommend.

This is my 3rd time purchasing this item. I love that it is adjustable to fit several models of televisions, sturdy, and will tilt and turn like you want/need it to. Have recommended it to anyone who is buying a flat screen tv, though many folks are impatient and cannot wait for it to arrive in the mail, which doesn't take that long. (You can always set it up on the self-contained stand until the wall mount arrives in less than a week.)They want their tv up NOW and purchase a more expensive wall mount that does LESS. Then when they see mine, they always say they should have listened to me.
Did the job for my led tv! great support for my 40 inch tv. no problem with installing it either
this wall mount is very steady and gives you lots of abtions position wise so you can see your tv in any position

Great value and functionality...very pleased with the two I purchased which are both in bedrooms holding a 32" flat screen but will hold a much larger tv if necessary...great swivel and tilt...very good price as well
This product was easy to install and worked as advertised. I would use this again if te need arrises. The look and strength made this a good fit for a tv wall mount.

After we located the stud and predrilled all the holes for the screws, this installed very securely and provides a good range of motion.The one hiccup was the plate that attaches to the monitor - while it had all the screw holes in the right place for our monitor (Viewsonic 22"), one of its "wings" extended over and blocked the cord and DVI sockets on the back of the monitor. I had to do some judicious hacksaw work to provide access. This had no effect on the strength of the mount, since it was all past the screw holes. But be aware a little additional work may be necessary on your install.
summary: Very strong mount, but check for blockage

reviewText: We bought 2 of these. One to go with a new purchase and one older TV. The functionality seems to be just what we need.  Thanks for the fast shipment!!
Works great and was relatively easy to install. Seems to be holding up well.  No complaints. I would recommend to anyone.

What I received is more of a butterfly looking plate And therefore doesn't fit my tv without covering my inputs.  I am going to have to return it unless my dad can't use at his house.  Really bummed as I measured and thought I covered all my bases.  The item pictured looks like is would fit fine :(

I have an older very heavy 36" Samsung High Def TV that weighs substantially more than my new 42". I replaced my old basement CRT tv with it, installed the VideoSecu mount easily and it does the job. I was amazed, the price from Amazon was only $30 dollars and with prime I got free 2 day shipping. The original price was $149. Wow, what a reduction!

Used this for a Panasonic 32" LCD TV.  Mount works fine, instructions were minimal.  I was able to use the supplied hardware to attach the TV and to attach the mount to the wall.  I did have a problem hanging the TV, per the instructions you have to mount the unit and now attach the TV, this was not very easy so I removed the mounting plate at the pivor point and took it off the wall mount, mounted this on the TV and now re-attached to the TV mount, this was a lot easier.

Works great... kind of a pain to install it took two guys and some power tools... and a lot of measuring... make sure you follow directions... also I didnt need all the hardware it came with, come one guys... not trying to make my walls swiss cheese. sheesh.
It works great for our 42" TV. It was very easy, It only took my husband and I about 30-40 minutes to install.

The product is good and as described.I have a 32" Vizio TV and somehow, this wall mount seems to be a little too weak for my TV. I still managed to mount my TV just fine, but gets a little paranoid that it will give in within the next few months because the mount won't be able to carry it.But the full motion swing feature is amazing! Especially if you are in a larger room.

Very good and very simple to install, but if you don’t pressure enough one of the screws it does not balances well in to the wall, so be very Shure to have it done by an expert or someone that does it very well
My second order of this item.  Amazon has the best price for wall mounts,  Please with this product and I would order another when I buy another tv.

The TV is still hanging from the wall so that's a good thing. The info for this wall mount says it is good for up to 66 LBS. Our old Phillips 37" flat screen weighs 58 LBS (including the stand) and after 3 weeks the TV and mount are secured to the wall via a vertical 2 x4" frame member. The mount came with almost every imaginable combination of nuts, bolts and spacers and straps to fit various size and brand TVs. I had no problem coming up with the right combination for my big and heavy old Phillips.

Installation was relatively easy with this mount,  I have a similar one on another tv in the house.  everything is very straight forward except for putting the TV on the mount.  options are either install tv to mount then secure whole mount to wall,  or the reverse.  with a 32" tv this isn't too bad.  The other style mount I have has a plate that mounts to tv then hooks to the bracket on wall holding tv in place while you permanently secure it. This one does not have that,  with two people this mount would be a breeze,  but by myself trying to hold a 32" tv 7 feet off the ground,  line up the screw holes and install the screws so i could let the tv go was a major pain.
Bought this mount for a 32inch Panasonic LED TV. The mount may look cheap, but I found it to be extremely sturdy and a great buy for the price. I strongly recommend it to everyone.

great product ,great price the only thing that should be noted is the mounting point is not centered its offset, so if you are mounting over fireplace as i am this creates a positioning problem. i worked it out though just wished it was part of the discription.
The product quality was much sturdier than I expected based on the excellent price.  I ended up buying a total of 3 and they all work great.

I bought this wall mount to hold a LG 32 inch LCD TV.  Given that this mount can support almost twice the weight of my TV, it was a little bit of overkill but better safe than sorry.  The unit is already assembled right out of the box and just needs to be attached to the TV and a wall stud.  I made a quick template by rubbing a blank piece of paper on top of the wall bracket with a pencil. I then used a stud finder to locate the nearest studs where I wanted the TV to be and taped the template to the wall.  I used a drill driver to make pilot holes for the lag screws which helps greatly with getting them in.  I was able to use four of the lag screws.  There is a plastic two piece lag screw cover (included) that clicks together easily over the lag screw heads to make for a clean look.  The wall bracket allows for different screw patterns for easier installation.  Once I had the mount secured to the wall, it was time to attach the TV to its bracket.  This took two of us to do it quickly.  One lifted the TV and the other pressed the bracket flush against the TV and hand tightened the four screws that go into the back of it. This allowed the TV to be supported easier while a screwdriver was used to finish tightening the four screws.  After that, it was just a matter of adjusting the angle of the mount for the best TV viewing.This thing works as advertised.  The extension arm works smoothly and without much effort.  The tilt function has a nut that loosens to allow for pivot adjustments.  The cord management system works well to bundle the various cables and makes for a clean look.  You can pay a lot more for another mounting system but I doubt it will be better!
summary: Easy to use right out of the box!

reviewText: It worked beautifully with my Samsung Smart TV. Plus, the fact that it can handle more weight than my TV is very comforting.
Perfect fit for my 37" TV. Sturdy and strong. Will hold the weight
very easy to install has added brackets for bigger TV but did not need. Pulls out further then any other unit
Great value for the price. It took a little while to install. The VESA didnt quit line up.  I would recommend it.
The product works great. I have put 2 different Tv's on the wall mount and it works and adjusts great. Plus plenty of hardware for mounting the product was provided.
very versatile and STRONG…….my tv is just at the recommended limit and the stand is flawless…….very cool……great design……..very very cool…….
This was a Great price and worked well for my new 55" flat screen 3 D TV!  Easy assembly and strong mount.
summary: Swing arm TV wall mount perfect for my situation.  I bought a new 55" flat screen TV

reviewText: USED THIS TO PUT MY 26 INCH ON AND IT WAS AN EASY DO IT YOURSELF INSTALL AND IT WORKS AS DESCRIBED. BEEN USING IT FOR A COUPLE YEARS NOW WITHOUT ANY PROBLEMS.

We recently mounted a tv in our boys room but the arm was too short so we were only able to mount a smack tv. My husband was in search for a tv mount with a longer arm so we can get a bigger tv. He came across this and were glad we purchased it. It works well for a corner mount, the arm is more than long enough for our purpose.
summary: Sufficient arm length, and not too expensive.

reviewText: My boyfriend and I spent hours looking for the one I wanted. We came across this one and it was cheap!  After reading lots of reviews I didn't expect much from it, but it is perfect. It's holding my 32 inch Vizio  tv in my bedroom perfectly. My boyfriend did tighten lots of different bolts on it after it was up so it would be completely level. I think the people that say it sags didn't do this. He did use his own level and not the one it came with. I helped him when he did this. I held the tv in the position that made it level and he tightened lots of stuff until it held it there. I have had it up for a couple months with no problem. I love it. Perfect for the price. The hardest part was finding the stud. My apt complex had them every 22 inches on the wall I wanted it on:/
summary: Amazing product for the price. && how to keep it from not sagging.

reviewText: was really easy to installcame with a lot of  hardware to fit an situationwe did not  need to use the extension bars
I got this wall mount for my 39"" LED HDTV. The mount  fits well and is sturdy. Good price too.

summary: Works perfectly for 400 x 200 VESA mount Hiteker 37" TV to wood paneled wall.

reviewText: Good, strong mount and quality hardware. Includes all the different size screws required to attach to TV if yours doesn't have them (or if you lost them).  There is just the right amount of resistance in the joints for it to stay where you want it but still easy to move around.  I mounted a shelf above the TV to get the cable box out of the way and avoid having to run a long HDMI cable through the wall.I took a star only because I received a different unit than the one pictured, It has 2 thick arms, rather than the 2-1 that is shown.  Honestly I think what I got is more attractive, but I believe that Amazon vendors should not substitute different products without authorization.  My unit also did not come with the extender arms in the picture, it has a mounting plate with all of the VESA mounting holes in the correct configuration.  My TV is 26" so it fit perfectly.  I am sure my 55" would fit on it too, but I have a different mounting configuration for that one.
I do some adjust for a  sony 40" TV I'm happy I recommend to my friends also good price and fast service good qualitythanks..

I have been using this for a month or two now and must say that I am thoroughly impressed.  I was not sure if this would be enough wall connection since its holding up a good sized TV.My 60Inch has two LARGE BARS that hold onto the wall...For a smaller TV- I guess more is not required!  I swivel this TV pretty much every day and also needed it to CLEAR the wall bc my wall is 90 degrees from my viewing angle.Clears EASY-Sets up EASYInstalls EASYWill fit MOST Holes on the back of various TVsHIGHLY Reccomend
summary: AWESOME and WORKS GREAT for my 36Inch

reviewText: I did research at the box stores and by far this is the best price and quality. Most of the swivels were 3 times the cost. I'm very happy customer and this was easy to install.

Excellent bracket for doing everything I wanted my 47" to do. The reviews were very helpful and made an easy installation even easier.  It does tilt a little to the right requiring a small adjustment. Terrific price!

I used this to mount my 27 inch Samsung in my bedroom. It feels very sturdy and I do not expect any problems with sagging or falling with it. For the price this mount is excellent. Why pay more for something that you will not see and does the same job as other high priced mounts. The only thing I did not like was the way the instructions have you mount the TV after the bracket is attached to the wall but like another reviewer stated, I removed the head from the arm, attached it to the TV and then reattached the head to the arm and slid the bolt that I removed back in. I did reverse the orientation of the bolt by having it drop in instead of pushing it in from the bottom. It made it much easier. After 15 years of having a TV on the edge of my dresser I finally freed that space up and have my TV mounted on the wall and I am very happy with this purchase.
summary: Price is great for excellent product. I'm happy.

reviewText: Ordered this for a 26" Flat Screen used in the bedroom...Overall it is a decent mount...It is a bit difficult to adjust and does not move as freely I would have thought...but it does work and it does cost less than many of the brackets...overall a good value...
It works, it moves, it moves every which way, uses one stud, you will be pleased, cheap, quality, good buy.
Outstanding product. Hung a 42" Vizio with ease. Great price and great quality. I would recommend this to anyone that needs to hang their tv.
Very solid...we mounted our flat panel in the bedroom. Like the tipping feature and love the articulating feature.We checked prices at stores, big boxes, etc. best price of all including Costco...
This was not the easiest to install due to location of installation but it works super.  I would recommend it for anyone.
summary: wall mount works like a charm!

reviewText: I bought this tv swing arm mount for my tv from amazon.Its been a good one its built heavy duty to hold pretty big tv .I would have anyone of my friends buy this same mount for their tv. It lets you hang it up and out of the way and also you can turn it out or in adjustable to see it from anywhere I set in my living room. This unit is easy to mount on wall and put together by yourself but if you have an extra person around it would make it a little better when holding the tv up when it clips in at top then screw and tighten and adjustments and like everything else I've bought from amazon it ships fast right to your door step.

Why would you spend over $100 for another mount when you can get this one? I was very skeptical of this when I saw the price. I'm glad I got it. Incredible mount, especially for the price.  All of the hardware was included and nicely organized.

I think this is basically a good product. It is very sturdy for the money. My only beefs are that I found the instructions quite poor and lacking  in detail. I found the tilt and swivel adjustment more difficult than other reviewers. It requires you to loosen a bolt that is hard to get to, and it took me a while to figure out where it was because it was hidden under plastic covers in the arm. Because it is so sturdy and very affordable, I will probably buy another for my upstairs tv.
This product works as advertised.  It is worth what it costs.  It doesn't quite move easy enough - almost like it needs some lubrication. But other than that, I recommend it.
summary: VideoSecu Articulating LCD LED TV Wall Mount Full Motion Tilt Swivel Monitor Mount Bracket for most 22" to 37" Flat Screen with

reviewText: I bought this for my 55" Samsung LCD LED TV. I mounted it on a wall and intended to use it extended to 180 degrees. At the 180 degree extension, there is very noticeable tilt, which gets worse each day, until the TV is tilting sort of comically. If you are just using it to watch a TV "head-on" the tilt probably won't matter to you, but if you are using it at any sort of angle for a large TV you will have the tilt problem. The arm is simply not designed properly to handle the 180 degree extension.Also, if you are new to this TV mount thing, note that this VESA 400 compatible mount will not necessarily work for your VESA 400 compatible TV. I discovered that not all VESA 400 mounts work with all VESA 400 TVs. I had to "improvise" to get this mount to work and could not use any of the mounting configurations in the instruction booklet. This problem had no bearing on the "tilt" problem described above. I don't really understand what the point is of listing VESA compatibility when it doesn't seem to actually indicate compatibility, but there must be some tech guru who has a complex and useless explanation for it somewhere.Otherwise, the installation was fairly easy. In about two hours I was able to get this attached to my wall, where it immediately began it's slow drooping progress toward the floor. I wish I had just kept the TV sitting on a table.
summary: Not strong enough for a 40 lb tv

reviewText: At the 28 dollars I paid, this is a great deal.  Solidly constructed and pretty easy to install, even with the badly-translated instructions.I recommend putting in just the top screw at first, and then installing the other screw after attaching the monitor.  That will let you adjust for any slight tilt created by torque on the monitor arm.*UPDATE* - It looks like they've changed the product.  Those large arms that stick out from the corners in the photo aren't present on my unit.  They may just be an addition, which would make it an even better deal.  Or they may have changed everything.

This is a great wall mount. it fits my tv well (i have a Dynex 32 inch 720p lcd) it puts a little more strain on the mount than i would like but it has held well for the few days its been up there.Also one of the screws that you use to bolt into the wall had a round head? anyways its a great tv mount, and the instructions are easy to follow. installation took about 20 min.
So glad we bought this item. Good price. Fast shipping. Works great with our TV we now have mounted on our deck. Extremely well made.
Very inexpensive compared to other sites and stores.  It was easy to install and works great with my Samsung 32in tv.
Easy to install...as described.  Makes it easy to see tv from anywhere in the room. Would buy this item again.
Was perfect for our new flat screen. Did take 2 people to get the tv mounted to it.  But we love the tilt feature, it makes watching tv in bed much easier.

Shipped promptly; exactly as advertised; well-made; perfect fit for our 32" LED HDTV; REASONABLY PRICED!  Anyone who can locate a wall-stud, read a level (included, no less!), run a drill, and turn a wrench clockwise should consider this wall-mount solution.
We purchased this TV Mount for the TV in our motorhome.  Several of our friends liked it so much that they asked us to order one for them.  Works great when changing from analog TV to digital HD TV.
Easy to attach. Easy to adjust. Very Solid and secure. Used on a clients 29" LED with built in DVD.

I received it, opened it, installed wall portion, installed back plate on 32" Sony TV, and mounted on wall without issue - very solid. I then discovered I had no place to plug my power cord, dang - it's under the back plate. reversed process and this time plugged in power cord first then applied back plate - re-mounted - adjusted viewing angle - Perfect!
I have my 32 inch Tv on the wall and it works great. Easy to install and came with all the parts. The screws that it comes with for the TV will not fit but you can buy some for 2 dollars.
I strongly suggest purchasing this product.The price is unbeatable compared to the local stores! I recommend this product to the fullest.

For the money you can't go wrong. Yes, it has a litlle play in the mechanism but, you can adjust your mounting to accomodate that. It works great and frees up counter space. I would do it all again. Why spend 3 times more.
summary: can't beat it for the price

reviewText: I love this mount! All the adjustments for tilt and extension are awesome! Holds a Sony 32in Ex-3000 just fine even fully extended. Even bought another. A++Mike

I order all my mounts from Amazon for price and quality.  This is mount #4 and is the best. It comes fully assembled except for extension brackets if needed and already tensioned.  Very good quality and build. This my favorite mount!!
I have this mounted on my wall in my editing studio.  It holds a 27" LCD monitor (about 20-25lbs).  It's been up for a week and I don't expect that it will fall down anytime soon.

This mount was the most inexpensive one I found on the internet or elsewhere.  It was easy to install.  It performs everything we wanted out of a mount.  It is sturdily made not cheaply made.  Great product!
summary: Most inexpensive but performs everything desired

reviewText: I bought this for a gift for a friend.  They liked it so much that I decieded to get one for myself.

I bought this mainly because of the distance the arm could reach.  It was 24" and most were around 12-16"  I had been looking in stores but good quality ones were beyond insanely expensive. I decided to give it a try based off amazon reviews and was extremely happy with it.  So much so, I bought a second one for a different tv in another room.

My students and I used to huddle around laptops to discuss projects. Now I have a 47" TV for display and this mount makes it possible to put it on any wall and swivel it in any direction depending on how many people need to see the screen. Really stable, no wiggling

We have a 26" TV in our bedroom and no real table-top space for it, so we mounted it above our dresser with this.  The arm tilts and moves smoothly so it's easy to set this however we want, as often as we like.  Great purchase.

3 Stars. It does what it is made to do. For how many years it will continue to do this i cannot say. It is sorta cheaply made, but for the price i can afford to replace it every year.Bottom line: If you want a "Top Quality" mount, this is not it.  If you are looking for a serviceable mount for the least amount of cash, this is definitely it.
NOT AS STURDY AS I WOULD LIKE IN THBE A BETTER COLOR.E 3 DIMENTIONAL MOVEMENT, WHITE WOULD BE A BETTER COLOR. .

I bought this with a Coby TFTV3225 since I wanted a wall mount and it was in the recommended items section - it does not fit!! The TV is a VESA 200 400 not 100 200. Yes, it was already on the wall when I realized this. Since it's in the "Customers Who Bought This Item Also Bought:" section, there must be a lot of returns...
Great product I like it very much and it moves my tv to view from several positions.  Great price also

It is a good value, but is not top notch quality. If you extend both arms in the same direction, the TV (30 inch) tilts. However if the arm goes right, then left, the play in the hinges offset each other and it works great.

Wall mount worked great and the price beats paying $80-$100 at a store seems like great quality I put a 40 inch Magnavox on it about a month ago and still on wall! Only problem I had was screws were a little to long that went into back of tv and wouldn't completely tighten up. I ground them down a bit but a couple of small washers would have worked well also. I think it was just the brand of tv and the diameter of screw needed. Kit did come with various sizes of screws for the back of tv.
summary: working great! still on the wall!

reviewText: I purchesed this mount to accomendate my 32 inch LCD tv. It works fairly well. The only problem is that it's swivel points are metal to metal and require a little grease to make them move eaiser. Other than that it is a solid mount for the price.

My mount came in without any hardware. No bolts, washers, sleeves, anchors,or spanners. I did check the box for the proper model number (ML563B), and I did check the description to make sure hardware should have been included ("Standard hardware and user manual included.").Amazon offered me a return at no cost, as they shipped it but did not sell the product. My options were to refund for another model, reorder the same model and risk the same issue, or just buy the hardware myself. I spent nearly $10 on hardware, but my 40" television is securely mounted to the wall. The arms are a bit stiff, but they don't move once they've been adjusted. It has the right tilt for mounting near the ceiling.
loved it....half the price compared to stores will be getting another one for my daughters tv.....diff recommend buying this good luck

I was so excited by the price...the one i wanted at walmart was $159 dollars,  Once I recieved this one, i could see a big difference from the one I was considering.  It doesn't move fluidly at all...the instructions even say put it where you want it and tighten the screws.  I wanted one the could tilt out to watch in from bed them push back against the wall.  If that is what you what...DONT GET THIS ONE.  It seems unsturdy stretched all the way out with a 32in tv also.If you are like me, and dont want to shell out a lot of money, this one will be fine to mount , push it back against the wall, tighten screws and leave it.  Even the screen tilt scfrew.  Also, if mounting a bigger tv....all the screws are really close together and its a lot of weight in one spot.  It seems solid for now...but I haved got complete faith in it.Overall great for the price if you want to mount it and leave it.  If you want one to constant move around...you gotta spend some bucks.

I purchased this for a 24" Sony TV. The instructions are clear, and easy to follow. There are many sizes of screws provided to ensure that your TV will have the necessary hardware. The arm articulation is smooth horizontally. However, if you want to angle the tv you have to loosen a nut, so if you typicall change the angle of the screen often, you could get frustrated. If you are looking for an easy TV wall mount this is one.
This worked out great for mounting a 22 inch. LCD in our guest room.Very easy to mount and works great.Great price also.

The mount itself seems fine, it just didn't work with the Phillips tv we bought....the 'x' arm things did not line up and if they did then the 'x' parts would have covered the holes for the inputs...........we ended up using one we had had around here.......seems to be built well though and sturdy

Got this to replace a Peerless Paramount wall mount when I got my new TV.  Let me start off by saying it works as advertised.  But that won't get you 5 stars.  The problem is installation.  Maybe it's my own fault for thinking all TV wall mounts worked like the Peerless I had.  See, that one has a separate TV plate that you screw to the TV first.  Then you have the second piece (the actual wall mount) that you screw to the wall.  Once that's done, using the bracket mounted on the TV, you hang the TV on the wall mount and secure it with a single bolt.  One person can easily put a TV on the wall.Not so much with this one.  Yes, I will admit that once it's mounted, it's a more secure connection, but it's the mounting that's the problem.  You can't do it alone.  Depending on the weight of the TV, you will need at least one helper.  This mount is one piece, which means that you have to hold the TV to the wall-mounted plate while attaching it with screws.  That can get tricky, especially with heavier TVs (I used it for a while with my old LCD TV which weighs 40+ pounds).  They do get kudos for providing all the screws for all VESA types as well as a regular and an Allen wrench.Three stars for ease of installation, five stars for usability, for a combined four stars.  Make sure you get help when installing.
I found this to be a good product for the price.  If you need a nice, light weight mount, this is a good way to go.  Easy to install.
Works great with our 39" Apex TV. Does not sag. Seems very sturdy. My husband mounted it and only needed my help for about 30 seconds.
summary: Works great with our 39" Apex TV!

reviewText: It is up know and should work fine, but it was hard to get it to fit my TV due to the bulge on the bottom, but I made it work and it is on the wall.
This item is easy to install..it fits just perfect in the corner where we mounted it for our kitchen TV.

Do not buy this for the Haier L32D1120 32" TV. It is not compatible with that TV. However, you can purchase "VESA adapter plates" for it. The Haier TV seems to require VESA 400x200, and this mount is only VESA 200 x 200.
summary: Do not buy with Haier L32D1120 32" TV !!!

reviewText: Very strong for any tv, but I wish that it was little longer I am very happy with it and very strongly recommended.

Having purchased this mount for an application it wasn't really intended for, it's doing just what I needed.I was looking for a way to wall mount a fairly hefty Polk Audio Monitor 40 to use as a center channel speaker for my HT sound system. Polk recommends these speakers be mounted at least 2' off the wall to keep from muffling the rear facing bass port and this mount fits the bill to a T for a heck of a lot less expense than the typical center channel speaker stands sell for ... Bonus!BTW, these Polk Monitor 40s are essentially the same speaker as their purpose built center channel speakers for 1/2 the price as I got a pair of 'em for what Polk sells single center channel speakers, and .... got a 2nd one to use for the center channel for my BR system in the process. So long as you don't mind either standing them up as intended or that the Polk emblem ends up sideways when you lay 'em on their sides like I did, they make a great center channel speaker for a bargain price.This did require some inventive modifying with my die grinder and a cut off wheel to cut away most of the mounting pad intended for attaching to various monitors/Tvs, then a lil touch up painting after the cutting but what I ended up with was just what I needed. The cable management already in place works just as well for speaker wire as it would have for an HDMI or similar video cable too.Yeah, these are of Chinese manufacture, but I was unable to find a similar American made product, and let me assure you, I did try.  This is my second VideoSecu mount I've purchased as I have one for my 37" Tv in the BR and both mounts are well made, came with ample mounting hardware for many different applications and are very sturdily built with a great overall "fit and finish".Hey, VideoSecu, you guys have a great potential for an awesome wall mount center channel speaker mount in this product by simply modifying the mounting pad to easily use it for this purpose as I did, are ya listening? Oh yeah, and I'll gladly accept any R&D;/Marketing funds you'd like to send my way ;>)
Easy install!! Looks great and works great for what we need!! Purchased for game room, took 5 min. to install and 1 min. to set TV on. Great!!
summary: Great Product -Easy install 5 min. to install. TV looks great on the wall. can move around easily

reviewText: It is a solid mount and I doubt that it will ever fail to hold the 22" LED TV that is mounted on it.  My only complaint is that the bolt that attaches the arm to the wall plate is smaller then the hole in the wall plate so when the TV is anything other than parallel to the wall it leans (up to 1.25" from one side of the TV to the other ~16") but for the price I can live with that.
The mount works, but it is unrefined compared to other brands out there. Purchased because it was on sale. just ok.
Great product even for double or triple the price. Smooth articulation and solid craftsmanship. And it comes with e erything you Could need to get going. I'd happily but it again!

I consider myself to be a good DIYer. I've installed mounts for my 2 Samsung 46" and 55" LED TVs with no problems for 5 years. So, for this VideSecu mount, inspite of poor installation instructions, I carfeully measured all domensions to fit my new 32" Samsung LED SmartTV in a limited kitchen space. My mistake was, based on the diagrams, I assumed that the length of both the swinging arms of the mount (the single and the double arms) were of the same length. What a disaster! After installing the mount when I mounted the TV and folded the arms the TV did not center itself to the wall side of the mount! It was then that I noticed the inner length of the 2 arms is about 4" longer than the outer single arm. In other words once the arms on the mount were fully folded in towards the wall my TV was not centered in the limited space that I had and looked awful. I don't know why the manufacturer did not keep both arms the same length. At least they shd have mentioned it in the instructions.This to me is a major product defect. Luckily with Amazon I was able to return this mount but had to pay return S&H;.
summary: Beware the TV will not center....folding arm lengths not same

reviewText: Works great for a cheap mount. Worked great on a 32" Emerson LCD tv. Does everything as advertised! Can tighten or loosen joints for easier movement.
I brought a 32' tv for my room, and bought this mount to hold. Very good detailed instructions. Packaging was well kept and came on time.. Works great for all tvs.
very easy to install.  It took no time and is firmly in the stud.  The package came with many different nuts and bolts to handle any situation.

Easy to installEasy to use and adjustAllows for multiple viewing angles, so we're able to watch from multiple rooms.4 stars because I did have to go buy longer screws to mount the TV to the bracket, but overall a Great Value!!
We needed something to Extend our tv away from the hot pipe for the winter and this wall mount did the trick. It went up with no a problems. It worked out very well!
its a little flimsy and not the easiest to put together, for the price it works.  But for the quality i'd go with Cheetah.

So you're going through all the possible wall mounts for sale, and you after you've noticed that most of them are north of $50, and many are selling for $80, $100, or more, then you start thinking about this unit.The hope is that you'll spend something around twenty bucks on a device built in China (I believe), and use it to secure your flat panel television (your sweet baby) to the wall. Your television probably cost you several hundred dollars, so entrusting it to this wall mount is a big leap of faith.I received mine about three weeks ago, and since I'm not handy, I had my buddy help me. You better be ready to drill, because you're going to be mounting it into the wall with multiple screws/brackets. You have to know how to find the stud in your drywall...It took my friend and I about forty-five minutes to install the unit.Included with the wall mount is a tool, some sort of wrench you will need, but it was so poorly constructed that we wore it away so badly in the first few minutes that it no longer turned the included screws.So far, for the last month, the wall mount has held my 32" television (which falls within the allotted weight) up to the wall. There are two caveats: firstly, I NEVER pull it out, articulate it, turn it... nothing. I don't trust the wall mount enough to do anything but leave the television flush against the wall. Secondly, make sure you have a level with you, not just for installation, but pretty much for the life of the wall mount so you can make sure your television is level from time to time, in case you bump it or move it ever so slightly.Well, that's all there is to say. Good luck to you.

Purchased this for a small 22 in TV for bedroom. The mount weighs more than the TV ! That's not a complaint though. I actually took down the 22 inch set today and mounted a 37in Sharp Aquos. Much heavier set than 22 in, no issues at all. It supports the 37 in just fine. The set probably weighs 35-40 lbs. For the price, $25,it was a great bargain. Installed it myself into wall studs,very secure.

I wasn't sure if I had the right tools, but found all I needed was a socket wrench and screw driver. The mount is already assembled and most of the "stuff" in the box are extensions, bolts, and different size screws you may need depending on your TV and size. They cover all bases! Very easy to assemble... It takes longer to screw the bolts into the wall (2 by 4) then it does to assemble the mount.
summary: They make sure you have everything!!

reviewText: We needed a wall mount for a 32” TV that was going to be in the screened in porch.  This was one of the brands recommended by the guy that was going to install out wall mount.  I can’t speak to the ease or difficulty of installation but it looks great and we can swivel it if necessary for best viewing angle.  It's also pretty sleek so it doesn't butt out too much.  It arrived quickly and it didn’t take the installer long but of course he was a professional.  Looks great!

This product is very inexpensive and very reliable. If you are wanting to move your TV around very often, this may not be the best as the joints do not move very smoothly. However, the mount is very sturdy with my 32" Sony Bravia. It was very easy to install and came with all the necessary hardware. It is the perfect product for those on a limited budget. The trade off is the smoothness in the joints. Safety and heavy construction are prominent features.

reviewText: I used it on my Vizio 42" TV and it is working great. Because I had it mounted on a wall that is brick and plaster I had to be mounted onto plywood which was mounted onto the wall.
I bought this when I moved and I love that my TV is mounted.  This mounting bracket is perfect my TV and it moves so many ways.
Easy to install and very well built. Put it together in five minutes, then ten to place and screw to the wall. EASY!  If needed I would buy it again !
This is a Great Wall mount and especially for the cost!  I've ordered a second one to hang another tv. I would definitely recommend!
Bought the tv from Walmart they wanted eighty dollars for the same one. It does what I wanted it to all bolts needed wa in the box took about ten min. To install

So I spent awhile banging on the wall to find the stud, then started drilling holes only to solid 17 holes to find it. Once i found it, another 5 holes later showed me where the edges were. I still ended up just missing, only getting 4 out of the 6 screws actually into the stud, but its solid with a 32" LCD 28 pounder. The level it comes with is great- don't be afraid to take it apart to make installation easier.
It works for the tv I bought but I had to use some of my own washers for the screws.  I thought it would have everything.
Great product, awesome price compared to store prices, highly recommend product,easy to install.  Good quality, matches most tv brands. Great bargain
Easy install and great design. The product was exactly what I thought it was going to be and just as as the picture shown.
The package came in time and everything was in the box. My boyfriend put it all together and it's been over a year and the tvs still hanging in the mudroom.
I have mounted a 42 inch old LCD. Easy to install. Easy to swivel, there is tilt option but it has to be locked by nuts(it can not be changed without loosing the nuts).

I wanted to put my mac in the wall and leave it. This does that well.  I don't move it often it seems strong and well built. If you want to move it a lot get something different you have to keep an Allen wrench and a crescent wrench in the desk drawer if you plan on moving it a lot. The articulation is sketchy. Given the wealth of reviews, I thought this wall mount would be a safe bet. (It's worth noting that the enclosed instructions *do* mention that in some cases, the bolts may need to be adjusted manually. Unfortunately, these were so tight, they could not even be loosened with a wrench.)After about half an hour of struggling with it, I returned it as defective. Better luck next time.

reviewText: We ordered this flat screen tv wall mount to hold a 32" flatscreen tv.Item was easy to install and comes with good directions.  Lots of differentscrews are included to work with different TV brands and models.  Thewall mount tilts and also adjusts side-to-side.  We found it easier to attachmounting plate to back of TV and then to attach the mounting plate toarm, rather than attaching mounting plate to arm and then attaching TVto mounting plate per the directions.  The apparatus is well constructedand we were impressed with the quality for the price.

I have purchased a total of 4 HDTV wall mounts from the VideoSecu companyand they are all quality products at a very reasonable price.-Tilt TV Mount: for stationary TVs up to 65 inches.-Articulating:  corner mount for SMALL TVs-Long Arm:  corner or high mobility mount for LARGER TVsAll of them are excellent products, and very easy to install.

Received this item quickly and well packaged (But not so well that I was infuriated trying to open it)Everything was in perfct order. Strong, handsome appearance. Installation Kit is perfectly in order and gives a ton of options for different senarios.  Couldn't possibly be happier with this product.

I love everything about this mount. It's versatile, holds our 30" LCD TV no problem and is discreet. My only complaint at all is that the instructions for mounting lacked a little detail but we looked up some videos and everything was fine. Most of the other mounts I found were twice the price so this is certainly a good deal!
summary: Great item for a great price!

reviewText: This is a great wall mount.  I have installed three others and I like this the best.  It extends enough with the second arm so that you can mount a large TV so that it fits in the corner of a room.  The TV will hide the actual wall mount and arms mounting to the back of the TV.  This one was installed thru a plaster drywall into cinder block wall.  I used  the 2 wall anchors and bolts provided in the mounting accessory pack.  The 42" TV bolt pattern fit the mounting plate so I did not have to use the adjustable arms provided in the package.  Total installation time was less than 20 minutes.  I like the fact that you can tilt it, rotate it (makes it easy to get the TV level)  and move it in and out a great distance and it will go back pretty flush to the wall.  The instructions are easy to follow.  Overall, I think this is a sturdy mount that will confidently hold a large screen TV and it does not look like a massive mount like some do.
summary: Great Wall Mount for the Price!

reviewText: Best Buy has mounts that are basically the same as this for $125. This one is sturdy, came with all the mounting hardware you could need, and was easy to install. Twenty five freakin' dollars! Why did I leave my television on milk crates for so long?
Could offer a little more in flexibility of installation, but once in place the set can be placed in just the right position repeatedly.

After looking at a couple of negative reviews, I thought I would take a chance on this wall mount and I'm glad I did. This mount was very sturdy and is one the heaviest mount I've. (which, in my opinion, vouches for it strength. I mounted a 2012 51 inch Samsung plasma TV and , after two weeks, the mount still holds. I have used it for hours extended in multiple positions - it still holds.

Very good price and very good quality. I made big mistake before when I paid 3 time more for almost same product in a local store and quality was sucks. Buy it, you will like it and nobody can not beat the price
Fit my TV perfectly, a snap to install on both TV and wall. I can now watch my TV at any angle I please

Installation was simple. Many reviewers commented on how hard the mount was to turn... All that needed to be done was the bolt be loosened a fraction. If you wanted to go the extra step, you could spray wd-40 on it really quick and it's perfect. Can't be happier with the purchase. Put a 32 inch vizio on it and it swings freely with no problems or bend. Trust me, loosen the bolt a hair and see the difference. Those other buyers must have no mechanical sense about them.
The directions stink. Just remember the spacers go under the arms if you have to use them and you will be ok.
summary: Awesome and cheap. The directions stink. Just remember the spacers go under the arms if you have to use them and you will be ok.

reviewText: This mount is best used if the TV needs to extend away from the wall or be rotated so it is not parallel with the mounting wall.  The mount I received was exactly as described.  "Fits VESA (mounting hole patterns) 100x100 200x100  200x200mm without extender, and also fits VESA  600x400  400x400  600x300  400x200  300x300mm with 4 plate extender:  loading capacity up to 66 lbs;  VESA TV plate can be taken off, quick release design for easy installation;  Standard hardware and user manual included."  The enclosed mounting hardware was sufficient to attach the wall mount to wood studs or masonry walls, and there is an assortment of  screws to attach the TV plate to the back of most TVs.  The wall plate also has a plastic cover that snaps on and hides the mounting bolts, giving the wall mounting plate a "finished look."  The included instructions were well written, detailed and describe the mounting process in step by step fashion. (In my opinion, some of the best instructions I have seen for the half-dozen mounts I have installed.)  One definitely needs a stud sensor, electric drill and a good wrench to install the mount.  I used the mount on an older 42 inch plasma that weighs 60 lbs, so it will handle its rated weight, assuming both mounting bolts of the wall plate are properly secured in studs.  I have observed no "sagging," but I would say the arm "flexes"  about 1 inch with my 60 lb TV attached and the arm fully extended.  In summary, I rate it 5 stars, and feel this is an excellent mount for the money, especially if one has a heavier (40-60 lb) TV with VESA mounting holes larger than 200x200.
summary: Good mount for VESA mounting holes larger than 200x200

reviewText: I bought 2 for mounting 1 46" in my bedroom, & 1 46" in our media room. Easy mounting, kit contained everything necessary minus the drill. TV mounted very securely, & easy positioning to practically any angle desirable. Best bang for the buck of any wall mount available.
summary: The most versitle TV mount available

reviewText: This mount works perfectly...I purchased one about two years ago for a small garage TV and now for a larger bedroom tv and they both were a breeze to install and they work great.Quality material for a great price!

We used to have a larger TV that sat on a shelf in our 5th wheel. It had fallen a few times, when we forgot to place it on the floor before driving. My husband uses our trailer for staying on site at his job. We ended up buying a small flat screen TV and this mount is so great, it swivels so we can view it anywhere in our trailer. When we travel, no need to put the TV on the floor. all we do is secure it to the wall by putting a bungie around the TV and the mount and we're ready to roll. Thank you

Well, it was super hard to anchor for me, it was going into a concrete wall with drywall over it.  I need super long anchors to reach the concrete block and anchor this thing securely.  I guess if you are satisfied with anchoring the mount into the drywall it would be much easier but I wanted it to be super solid!  I also needed to buy adapters to mount a VESA 400 TV.  So now it is supporting a 32" LCD and is rock solid.  Overall I give the product a solid 4 stars!  Another point, all of my TV's over 30" have a VESA 400 mount so expect to spend another $15 on adapters for this item to support televisions it says it supports.  Would have given five stars if it would support a VESA 400 mount.
summary: Strong and secure! Wish it would support VESA 400

reviewText: It is better than spending twice the money on this going into a brick and mortar store. Was very pleased.
Works great, easy to install, and fits almost any TV. Love the tilting feature. It has a low profile when you want the TV flat against the wall, so that keeps everything out of the way.

I received the proper item. not the one pictured here. it fit almost perfect. minor adjustment. works as stated. I am completely happy with this purchase. rated 4 star because of minor adjustment. would recommend to a friend/.price was very low. compared to other stores.  pat.2378

The versatility of this bracket to be used on more than one size television is very remarkable.  Would recommend to anyone

Good quality.  Must mount on a stud.  I mounted to a metal stud by cutting a rectangle hole in wall, adding a 2 ft 2x4 in the metal stud track, patched the hole and then put up the mount.  Holds a 37" TV without a problem,even added a DVD player to the bottom of the TV and it is still on the wall after about 8 months.  Price on this item was great and it was sent with FREE FREIGHT!
This mount is just amazing, the price is unbeatable, its extremely easy to insall, definately gonna buy more for my next projects.

Been using this for at least a month now.  Using on a 32" so it does a full 90 degree angle.  Most of the time is just sits like that, so the mount is definitely strong enough.  And it folds too if I just want the tv against the wall.  Definitely worth the cash.
This item didn't disappoint. It's sturdy, has all the screws included for different flat screen models and yes, it works well.
Could not be happier, absolutely perfect.Clean looking solid build, beat the shat out of  my bedroom unit (payed twice as much)

After buying one for my 47" LED TV, I ordered 2 more for my daughter's sets. It goes up easy, adjusts to any position. It folds flat against the wall and had a low profile. for the money and 2 day amazon prime shipping, you just can't do better.

This thing is amazing at any price point, but at this price it is incredible. Easy to install. Adjustable. I took it apart at the middle, to mount one side to the wall, the other to the tv, then reconnected in place. 1 person job.
summary: Why would you buy anything else?

reviewText: Easy to install, works perfectly on a 40" Westinghouse LCD!  Includes all hardware required for almost any application.  Highly recommended!

We mounted a 36 inch TV. The 180 degree articulating arm is used fully extended and rotated 180 degrees on a regular basis. The tilt stays as positioned and will not move unless it is re-adjusted. Better quality than I expected. Exception is the plastic cover that hides the mounting screws. This is a mute point as it does not affect the function and does not show. Made in China.
Product arrived on time and was easy to assemble. Just as easy to hang on the wall and is currently holding a 46" Sanyo.
This worked perfect.  The universal design would fit 99.9% of the TV's as advertised.  Easy to mount and very durable.
Great mount that gives you all the features for 360 viewing.  Follow instructions and enjoy your flat screen TV as never before.

Heavy duty construction, easy to install, could have easer adjustment knobs as I use this on an RV and constantly make mount adjustments. Other than that this is a great product for the price and I would recommend it to anyone.

I mounted my 32" TCL which isn't a very heavy HDTV, but it makes the mount flex a bit more than I like. Not a soid mount with a 32" tv; less weight and smaller tvs should be fine.If you want a really solid mount for a 32" and up, spend the money and go better quality. I am a professional satellite installer and know how to find the stud, and mount it level and true. This is just adequate for the never-move situation my 32" is for, but for a tv needing some occasional motion I would listen to my cautions, and go better and heavier...something spanning 2 studs for support.
summary: Good mount, great for lighter TVs, or less than 32"...just OK for 32" but no more.

reviewText: This is not a high cost unit so i didn't expect too much.  It worked well and has given good service now for two years.  It could have a better cable management system on it, but I don't expect such frills at this price.  This is solidly made, no complaints
summary: Low cost, well made and no problems

reviewText: Look at what they charge out at Best Buy, etc.  Get this and save our $$$$!  And it came very promptly.

Perfect... This works great.  I went to Costco to see how much the wall mounts were there, I found it for around $180. I figured why not check on amazon, I found it there for $25.  It came on time, Exactly what I ordered it is not plastic its metal strong. Even though I only put a 24 inch TV on it I would be perfectly confident putting any size TV on it. I love it!!!Pro'sWell MadeMetalStrongEasy Set UpSeveral Mounting FigurationCon'sNone
Easy to install.  Has all the necessary hardware included.  Nice solid mount for my 42 Plasma and I installed another for my Brother's 42 LED TV.

I gave this product four stars because 1. its weight, which was substantial, not plastic or flimsy 2. Ease of installation 3. Sturdy, there was no sagging or loose parts once TV was attached 4. The price was outstanding for the product received.I would have given this 5 stars, but have only had it for a few days. Time will tell if it is as good as first impressions.Even so, I am ordering two more for the other TV's in our house. Very satisfied.

I bought two of these mounts for two different size TVs. (36" Vizio and a 27" Sony with built in DVD).When I looked in the different stores, I was very disappointed in the price.  Most were anywhere from $60 - $100.  When I saw these on Amazon, I took a chance and was very glad I did.  I don't plan on moving the TV in and out all that much, but wanted it flexibility - just in case.  They installed with ease, came with more than enough screws for most any TV.  Both are working great and have no problems what so ever.  I would buy them again.
summary: A good mount at a greeat price

reviewText: As long as you know how to use a level, a stud finder, a drill, and a wrench you can easily install this mount.  After shopping around at a whole bunch of stores I realized that you couldn't find one for this cheap, so I picked it up and was amazed with how well it was constructed.  Just a note, having 2 people help a lot just to making lining up parts easier.

This wall mount for flat screen TVs or monitors installs easy and works well. I have an older Samsung 32" flat LCD. It took less than 15 minutes to install, a novice installer maybe 30 minutes, and it comes with a variety of fasteners for the wall and TV. Easy to understand instructions and some wrenches included too. Packed well with no rust or finish defects.
It was easy to put up. I like the way I can move it around.  Overall great product. I would recommend this to anyone.
Bought three of these to mount two 37" and one 32" tv around the house. Very sturdy and zero complaints
Strong and easy to install. Fits my old flat screen and new flat screen. Nice for the bedroom where you can angle the TV for your comfort.

This mount was purchased for a 24-in monitor.Primarily because it allows the television to be moved to several different positions. The construction of the mount is extremely sturdy. The included HDMI cable is just the icing on the cake. The instructions are clearly labeled.For the price, you simply can't get a better deal.
summary: A good wall-mount for an unbeatable price.

reviewText: This is one of the better one's out there.  With the adapters I can't imagine any TV this would not work with.  I am actually going to buy another one.

Installation went well, instructions were clear and had more than enough hardware to complete the job.  Of course you will need a helping hand when putting something like this up on a wall, but overall it was easy.

The only discreption I have is the tools that the kit came with. Because I do not own any I had to resort to the tools they provided which were difficult to use when installing. It would have been great if it came with a stud finder as well

I have a full 42" HD flat screen mounted on this. Not only does everything look better than strapped to a table, but the adjustability makes this mount a pleasure to have.  It was simple to attach to the wall and has a small footprint, being a single stud wall mount.  The other major point of this mount is how many sized TV or monitors the mount can be adjusted to accept.  My TV mounts solidly and the mount itself is solid, yet adjusts with little effort.  This is just plainly a good and solid product that is well worth the money.
great productif you want  to make your leaving room to look real good that the way to go .
had a couple of guys put this up for me, but they said it was easy to install. I like the fact that I can move it around easily and tilt it anyway I want it to be.

We received the wall mount very quickly and it looked very good.  It mounted to the wall with no real problem, but since it is all one unit, you have to put the whole thing up, and then raise the TV up in the air, while you line up the screw holes in the plate with the holes in the TV back and get the screws started.  This is at least a two man operation, and our TV was small.  I cannot imagine doing this with a 32" TV.  With the four screws in place and the TV up in the air, we started connecting the wires only to discover the cable connection was covered by the mounting plate.  Brought the assistant back, removed the TV from the mount, had to disassemble the mount to get the mounting plate off, then take a hacksaw and cut one corner off the mount plate to uncover the cable connection on the back of the TV when the plate is in place, and then put it all back together again.  The design of the mounting plate is such that it cannot be disconnected from the rest of the mount and then put on the back of the TV at ground level.  The plate needs to be able to be mounted on the TV back at ground level to make sure all connections for the wires are clear.  We got it up, and it works well, but having to do it all twice, and hacksaw a notch in the mount for the cable is not what I call "easy installation".
No issues.  Works like it should.  Compatibility fine with my model TV.It's a great price too (I think) compared to other ones that do the same.

I ordered these for my sons bedrooms for there 32 inch tv's and they went up very easily with a stud finder. I had both units that i bought up and the tv's were hung in less than an hour each. the quality is very comparable to that you would get from walmart but, it was half the price. I am getrting one for the living room next. cant wait.

I would have given this a 5 star rating, but it came without instructions and there were parts missing. The part is that once I figured it out, I didn't need the missing parts, and it works like a charm.
Very pleased with this wall mount. Easy to install, does exactly what we wanted. Can adjust the viewing angle for all our needs.

I mounted a 32" flat-panel TV in a bedroom with this excellent product, which can be set permanently to almost any viewing angle (lateral and up/down tilt) and readjusted with wrenches. You'll need a stud-finder, a drill, and a screwdriver. A wide assortment of mounting bolts and adjustment wrenches is included.A very similar product at Best Buy is about $120. Save your money and buy this one (but be sure your TV weighs less than the specified max.)
This product is user friendly and versatile.It is easy to install and comes with everything needed for installation.Adding bidding could drill and bit

2nd time i ordered this one . shipping much better this time. no problems. easy install. but be aware when you fold the mount flat there is a 1-2 inch difference between folding right or folding the mount left.
it was so easy to install.  the instructions were simple and so was the process.  i was putting off the project for fear.  i should have hung the TV long ago.

i got it based on the a suggestion you know the products often purchased with------. So I got it it said it "FITS MOST" 19in-36 inch tv. So not true. Well it was a BIG let down more because it was a Christmas gift the TV and wall mount was going to be up Christmas morning oh joy....But no the stupid mount didn't fit the TV. So I have the TV still sitting in the box and told the kids that Santa will have to send us the extension parts via UPS. Not Cool at.

As soon as i received my mount it looked realy flimsey, but actually it is sufficient for the 32 inch sony tv that i use. The tools they provided were not good, luckily i have my own spanner set.Setting the mount is really easy, you might need someone to help you mount the TV(I did it my self though, was not easy alone). Adjust the joints to your convenience and enjoy watching.
summary: You might need your own tools

reviewText: Product arrived right on time. Installation was pretty easy. -- about 45 minutes. My wife helped me when mounting the TV but other than that, it was a one man job. Product came with good directions for mounting in a wooden beam or in concrete (for a basement I suppose) and slew of screws and other accessories to fit a variety of TVs. Fit my 32' like a glove.  Performed exactly as I desired once installed...TV swings into a sitting room off the master 180 degrees. I will likely reinforce the mount and reinstall down the road but the overall unit is fairly heavy duty and capable. I would think twice about mounting a TV over 30-35 pounds unless you reinforce the mount on the wall. Mine is 25 pounds and it is no problem at this point.  No real issues with tilt...when it is moved, you just adjust it to square.  Also, ensure the adjustment screws where the TV connects to the arm are kept fairly tight. Best 30 bucks I've spent in quite a while.  Tremendous value.

the right tool to extend my 23" all-in-one computer a few inches from me in the bedroom to cruise the internet or watch tv . what can I say , it works just how I wanted . A recommended product for sure , was easy to put up .

Santa brought me a 47" Vizio Smart 3D TV (M3D470KDE) for Christmas and I came to Amazon looking for a reasonably priced wall mount for it. After reading the reviews and the specs of this wall mount, I made the purchase. I got the free shipping and it arrived sooner than I expected, which is always good.It took me around 30 minutes to install this mount from opening the box to plugging everything back in. It has plenty of adjustments, articulates as expected, and holds this TV fully extended without issues. I recommend using a stud finder and drilling pilot holes for the stud screws and using a good ratchet & socket to drive the wood screw into the stud. I'm glad there  is only one stud to find and only two holes that need to be drilled, which makes it easy for anyone. lolAll in all, I'm very happy I got this wall mount instead of a more expensive one that does the same job.
summary: Can't Beat the Price and It just Works!!

reviewText: The mount itself seems well constructed.
